functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Guarded Rapier\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A precise thrusting sword that can","color":"gray"}','{"text":"chain many hits on opponents to","color":"gray"}','{"text":"great effect.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 12","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Cost: 5","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 1.1s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+1.8 Stamina Regeneration","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+5 Armour Toughness","color":"gray"}','{"text":"+4 Armour","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Weight: 2.0","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:11,Operation:0,UUID:[I;-842421776,515929888,-1702336701,-358995493],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUID:[I;2097674610,820625633,2084215771,-780366978],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"generic.armor",Operation:0,Amount:4,UUID:[I;768895133,164383844,922201260,-2123756215],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"generic.armor_toughness",Operation:0,Amount:5,UUID:[I;-1709029577,-122324124,688697184,-2048067396],Slot:"mainhand"}],HideFlags:6,HoldingID:12}
